name: Canberra
description: As Australia's capital city (and the home of Parliament House),  plays host to a community of residents who've relocated from larger cities such as  and  to work in politics, government and related industries such as media. Add a large student population (some of Australia's most prestigious universities are located here) and a number of renowned galleries and museums, and the result is a small but cosmopolitan city with a great food scene and plenty of creative flair.
